t: Worldwide Amazon private label brand share by category 2019 l Statistic | Statista
s: This statistic presents the share of private-label brands owned by Amazon as of March 2019, by product category. According to the findings, 47.7 percent of Amazon's private-label share was accounted for by the clothing, shoes, and jewelry product market.

t: How to Share an Item on Amazon?
s: Amazon product sharing allows customers to easily share product links and information via social media or email. The share button is visible on every product page. Sharing drives increased product and brand awareness. More people see your products which can lead to more traffic and sales.
